body.gathalast: Tādisaṃ bhajamānassa, seyyo hoti na pāpiyo.
Satañhi so piyo hoti, asataṃ hoti appiyo.
body.gatha1: Na bhaje pāpake mitte, na bhaje purisādhame;
body.gathalast: Dāruṃ namayanti tacchakā, attānaṃ damayanti paṇḍitā.
body.gatha1: Sabbattha ve sappurisā cajanti, na kāmakāmā lapayanti santo;
Na attahetu na parassa hetu, na puttamicche na dhanaṃ na raṭṭhaṃ;
body.gathalast: nayicche (pī.), nicche (?)adhammena samiddhimattano, sa sīlavā paññavā dhammiko siyā.
body.gatha1: Appakā te manussesu, ye janā pāragāmino;
Ye ca kho sammadakkhāte, dhamme dhammānuvattino;
Kaṇhaṃ dhammaṃ vippahāya, sukkaṃ bhāvetha paṇḍito;
